name: Elite Killer Bravo Shooter 3D - Sniper Shooting Game
name_original: Elite Killer Bravo Shooter 3D - Sniper Shooting Game
description:
This Army Sniper Shooting is an awesome frontline First Person Simulator (FPS) Sniper Shooting game. Step into the action filled FPS series, one of the best Army Sniper shooting games available on app store. Try this Elite Commando Shooter – kill, shoot and survive. You consider yourself the master for the FPS sniper war games, city sniper shooting is the game to test your skills to the limit. A shooting war intensifies between the terrorists and a lone commando elite sniper. Jack, the lone army sniper shooter takes out a terrorist by a head kill shot.

Elite Killer Bravo Shooter 3D Game Features :
-Become a real life army commando
-The best sniper shooter games available on app store.
-Amazing army sniper combat missions
-Different war missions: kill enemies or survive
